text: Ebam smarana karuna, ami apanake bale diyechilama ye, apanara palanakarta manusake paribestana kare rekhechena ebam ye drsya ami apanake dekhiyechi ta'o kora'ane ullekhita abhisapta brksa kebala manusera pariksara jan'ye. Ami taderake bhaya pradarsana kari. Kintu ete tadera abadhyata'i ara'o brd'dhi paya.
